description: Opticians can start face-to-face consultations again after a three-month hiatus due to the coronavirus pandemic.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man resumes eye tests
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man resumes eye tests - BBC News
maintext: He said although the resumption of sight tests was now allowed, it would "vary between the various practices", depending on "whether they've got the appropriate items that are required" to meet the new regulations.
